utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Monica? What time is it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uhh, 9.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But it's dark out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well that's because you always sleep to noon, silly! This is what 9 looks like.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I guess I'll get washed up then. Watch that sunrise.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm really getting tired of sneaking around.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know, me too. Hey! Y'know what if we went away for a whole weekend? Y'know we'd have no interruptions and we could be naked the entire time.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All weekend? That's a whole lotta naked.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I can say that I have a conference and you can say you have a chef thing.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh, I've always wanted to go to this culinary fair that they have in Jersey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, y'know your not though. Let's go.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait! What about Joey?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, guess what I'm doing this weekend! I'm going to this culinary fair in New Jersey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh weird, Chandler just told us he's got a conference there!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh now that-that-that's funny, it seems like Chandler's conference could've been in Connecticut or Vermont.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm not in charge of where the conference is held. Do you want people to think it's a fake conference? It's a real conference.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is Rachel here? I gotta talk to her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, she's out shopping.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Damn!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I told Emily to come. And I just need to y'know, talk to Rachel about it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait a minute! So when Emily comes you're just, you're not gonna see Rachel anymore?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well look, I'm just trying to focus on the "I get to see my wife," part, all right? And not the part that makes me do this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow, so you guys are, you're never gonna be in the same room together? How is that even gonna work?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I have no idea. I mean… But-but I assure you I will figure it out.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Doesn’t seem like it's going to work, I mean…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi, guys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We're flipping Monica's mattress.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So I'm thinking, basically we pick it up and then we flip it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah that's better than my way.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh okay, hey guys, would you flip mine too?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aww, man!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh look! A letter from my mom.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, Rach, y'know-y'know how Emily's coming right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah! I know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Can you hear anything?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yes, somebody just said, "Can you hear anything?"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, Joey's ass! What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, remember when they got in that big fight and broke up and we were all stuck in her with no food or anything? Well, when Ross said Rachel at the wedding, I figured it was gonna happen again, so I hid this in here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ooh, candy bars, crossword puzzles…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, Madlibs, mine!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Condoms?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You don't know how long we're gonna be in here! We may have to repopulate the Earth.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And condoms are the way to do that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Anyway it-it kinda-it all boils down to this, the last time I talked to Emily…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! My dog died!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, Le Poo, our dog!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Le Poo's still alive?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God, it says he was hit by an ice cream truck and dragged for nine--teen blocks. Oh. Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sweetie, we heard you crying. Please don't cry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It's Le Poo.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know it's le poo right now, but it'll get better.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can't believe it! We're here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ooh, chocolates on the pillows! I love that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, you should live with Joey, Roll-os everywhere.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come here. Okay, be right back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yes! Monica, get in here! There's a high-speed car chase on!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're switching rooms.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh dear God, they gave us glasses!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, they gave us glasses with lipstick on them! I mean, if they didn't change the glasses, who knows what else they didn't change. Come on sweetie, I just want this weekend to be perfect, I mean we can change rooms, can't we?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, but let's do it now though, because Chopper 5 just lost it's feed!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, so uh, y'know how there's something I wanted to talk to you about?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're nose is bleeding!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God. No! Oh not again! This-this happened when my grandfather died. It's ugh! Sorry. Oh, okay, so I'm sorry, what-what were you-what did you want to tell me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sorry. Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I uh, I can't see you anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I know. It's ridiculous! I can't see you either.

utterance.speaker: Hotel Clerk
utterance.content: I think you'll find this room more to your liking.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, great.

utterance.speaker: Hotel Clerk
utterance.content: They say he's only got half a tank left.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Half a tank? We still got a lot of high-speed chasing to do!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're switching rooms again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What? Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is a garden view room, and we paid for an ocean view room.

utterance.speaker: Hotel Clerk
utterance.content: Our last ocean view room was unacceptable to you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Excuse me, umm, can I talk to you over here for just a second?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look, these clowns are trying to take us for a ride and I'm not gonna let 'em! And we're not a couple of suckers!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I hear ya, Mugsy! But look, all these rooms are fine okay? Can you just pick one so I can watch--have a perfect, magical weekend together with you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, this one I like!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nothing! It's over! Dammit! This is regularly scheduled programming!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Can we turn the TV off? Okay? Do we really want to spend the entire weekend like this?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry, am I getting in the way of all the room switching fun?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, don't blame me for wigging tonight!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, who should I blame? The nice bell man who had to drag out luggage to 10 different rooms?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don't know, how about the idiot who thought he could drive from Albany to Canada on a half a tank of gas!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do not speak ill of the dead.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're supposed to uh, be spending a romantic weekend together, it-it, what is the matter with you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I just want to watch a little television. What is the big deal? Geez, relax mom.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What did you say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I said, "Geez, relax Monnnnn."

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey. Rachel, I-I-I've been wanting to tell you something for a while now and I really, I just have to get it out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, what's up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, y'know how you told me I should do whatever it takes to fix my marriage?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I told you to give Emily whatever she wants.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And while that was good advice, you should know that what-what she wants…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: …is for me not to see you anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's crazy! You can't do that! What are you going to tell her? Oh God. Ohh, you already agreed to this, haven't you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's awful I know, I mean, I feel terrible but I have to do this if I want my marriage to work. And I do, I have to make this marriage work. I have too. But the good thing is we can still see each other until she gets here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! Lucky me! Oh my God! That is good news, Ross! I think that's the best news I've heard since Le Poo died!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You have no idea what a nightmare this has been. This is so hard.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah, really? Is it Ross? Yeah? Okay, well let me make this a just a little bit easier for you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Storming out!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel, this is your apartment.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, well that's how mad I am!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Damn Rollos!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you're back!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How was your conference?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It was terrible. I fought with my colleagues y'know, the entire time. Are you kidding with this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, so your weekend was a total bust?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, no, I got to see Donald Trump waiting for an elevator.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you're back too!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. Umm, Chandler can I talk to you outside for a second?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, how was your chef thing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, it was awful. I guess some people just don't appreciate really good food.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, maybe it was the kind of food that tasted good at first but then made everybody vomit and have diarrhea.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I'd like to know how much the room was because I'd like to pay my half.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, fine, $300.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: 300 dollars?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, just think of it as $25 per room!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Urghh!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are you guys woofing about?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler stole a twenty from my purse!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nooooo!!! Y'know what? Now that I think about it, I constantly find myself without twenties and you always have lots!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You should've seen the look on her face. I don't want Rachel to hate me! I don't know what to do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You want my advice?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes! Please!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're not gonna like it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You got married to fast.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's not advice!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I told ya.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm going to the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man, if anyone asked me to give up any of you, I couldn't do it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, me either.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Maybe I could do it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi, Rach.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look, I know you guys heard about the whole thing with me and Ross but y'know, I've been obsessing about it all day and I'd just love not to talk about it. All right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I-I-I don't know if this falls under this category, but uh, Ross is right back there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's not Ross!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no! Not that guy! He does look like him though.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, Ross is in the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, its happening. It's already started. I'm Kip.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you're not Kip!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you even know who Kip is?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who cares? You're Rachel! Who's Kip?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Kip, my old roommate, y'know we all used to hang out together.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, that poor bastard.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: See? Yeah, you told me the story. He and Monica dated when they broke up they couldn't even be in the same room together and you all promised that you would stay his friend and what happened? He got phased out!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're not gonna be phased out!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, of course I am! It's not gonna happen to Ross! He's your brother. He's your old college roommate. Ugh, it was just a matter of time before someone had to leave the group. I just always assumed Phoebe would be the one to go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ehh!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, come on! You live far away! You're not related. You lift right out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, Mr. Bing. That uh, hotel you stayed at called. Said someone left an eyelash curler in your room.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes that was mine.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: 'Cause I figured you'd hooked up with some girl and she'd left it there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes that would have made more sense.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y'know, I-I don't even feel like I know you anymore man! All right, look, I'm just gonna ask you this one time. And whatever you say, I'll believe ya. Were you, or were you not on a gay cruise?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe? I'm sorry about the whole lifting out thing. You gotta come with me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come where?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wherever I go. Come on you and me, we'll-we'll start a new group, we're the best ones.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, but try and get Joey too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pheebs, you mind if I speak to Rachel alone for a sec?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, sure! Bye Ross! Forever.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi. What are you doing here? Isn't this against the rules?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I talked to Monica, look, I'm the one who made the choice. I'm the one who's making things change, so I should be the one to y'know, step back.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Ross…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, it's okay. Really. They're plenty of people who just see their sisters at Thanksgiving and just see their college roommates at reunions and just see Joey at Burger King. So is, is that better?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, it's not better. I still don't get to see you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, what-what would you do? Rach, if you were me, what-what would you do?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, for starters I would've said the right name at my wedding!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe this is happening.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know that too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, Rach? Sorry to interrupt but umm, Phoebe wanted me to talk to you about a trip or something.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I just came over to drop off…nothing. So that weekend kinda sucked, huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, it did.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, I guess this is over.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, y'know, you and me, it had to end sometime.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why, exactly?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because of the weekend, we had a fight.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler that's crazy! If you give up every time you'd have a fight with someone you'd never be with anyone longer than—Ohhh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, this isn't over?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You are so cute! No. No, it was a fight. You deal with it and move on! It's nothing to freak out about.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? Okay. Great!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh, welcome to an adult relationship!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We're in a relationship?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm afraid so.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh hey, Monica, I heard you saw Donald Trump at your convention.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I saw him waiting for an elevator.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, Rach, can I borrow your eyelash curler, I think I lost mine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, it's in there.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! Ohh! Oh!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey, can I talk to you for a second?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oohh!! Ohh! Oh-oh-oh! Oh-oh!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes. Yes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You?! And-and you?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes, but you cannot tell anyone! No one knows!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How?! When?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It happened in London.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: IN LONDON!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The reason we didn't tell anyone was because we didn't want to make a big deal out of it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But it is a big deal!! I have to tell someone!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no-no-no-no! You can't!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please? Please?! We just don't want to deal with telling everyone, okay? Just promise you won't tell.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! Man, this is unbelievable! I mean, it's great, but…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know, it's great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aww, I don't want to see that!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We're so stupid! Do you know what's going on in there? They're trying to take Joey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: The most popular Phoebe in tennis is called the overhand Phoebe. And if you win, you must slap your opponent on the Phoebe and say, "Hi, Phoebe!"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that's cute! We really all enjoyed it. But y'know, it doesn't count.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Count for what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Count in our heads as-as good Madlibs.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I guess I'm done.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fun's over!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait-wait, guys! If-if we follow the rules, it's still fun and it means something!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I think I'm gonna take-off.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Guys, rules are good! Rules help control the fun! Ohhh!
